/usr/bin/g++   -std=c++0x   CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/ShipComponent.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/CollisionManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/DataReader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Plasma.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Laser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Equipement.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/DisplayManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Projectile.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/InteractionManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Ship.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/InputManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/BoundingBox.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Battlecruiser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/MouseManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/KeyboardManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/PhysicsEngine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_exe.dir/src/Turret.cpp.o  -o ../bin/my_exe -rdynamic
